trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods and any overridden versions of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""></xref> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法和任何覆寫的版本<xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""></xref>它們工作流程設計介面上繪製時，衍生的類別中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint`活動設計工具、 字符或連接器會重新繪製工作流程設計介面上時，就會發生方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs 指定用來繪製物件，並在其中繪製的裁剪方框的圖形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref>具有指定的圖形、 裁剪方框、 檢視區和設計工具主題類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用來繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示要在其中繪製的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The view port in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製檢視連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref>来繪製的物件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref>與工作流程設計介面關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>用來描述工作流程的外觀及操作屬性，例如色彩、 樣式和背景。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref>包含工作流程的主題資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>要在其中繪製。

trans-unit.source: The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 裁剪方框所描述的區域是將使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>所提供</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的重繪螢幕上的區域

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>描述要繪製的區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref>與設計工具相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具具有<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>與它相關聯，設計工具會使用所描述的外觀及操作屬性<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>來繪製其本身。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>相關聯的設計工具將使用與設計工具，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>來重新繪製其外觀及操作屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref>描述設計工具的外觀及操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>用來在工作流程設計介面上繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>提供工作流程設計介面上繪製物件的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用來在工作流程設計介面上繪製項目。
